import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody, CardSubtitle, CardText, CardTitle, Table} from 'reactstrap' const Projects = () => { return(

My Projects

Restaurant App

 A web app where users can login/signup,View information about the restaurant,find available dishes and discounts,reserve tables and submit feedback to the restaurant.Various bootstrap classes such as grid system,Cards,Media objects,Accordion,Modals,Carousel were used.
Technologies and Languages used: HTML,CSS,Javscript,Bootstrap.

Playstore Analysis

 By using playstore dataset which consisted of around 10k rows and 13 attributes , after cleaning the dataset ,visualized the distribution of apps in various categories.With the implementation of regression model, categories and stats of the most installed apps,prediction of number of installs and reviews, before launching of apps were found.
Technologies and Languages used: Python,pandas,numpy,matplotlib,sklearn

Reactjs apps

 Todolist App - An app where a users can add tasks, simply and quickly and remove them.
BMI calculator – A user can calculate his/her BMI value and their category
Technologies and Languages used: HTML,CSS,JS,Reactjs,Reactstrap

Workshops and Hackathon

Attended a workshop on “Demystifying Information Security” organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering,Kumaraguru College of Technology Attended a hackathon “Climathon” conducted by Kumaraguru College of Technology

{}

) } export default Projects
